content:
I will approve your puzzle if the wording gets a little more specific. How about something like this?

Your task is to print a grid of width w and height h made out of periods ('.'). Every coordinate on the grid that is inside the rectangle, which has two opposite corners (x1, y1) and (x2, y2), should be a plus sign ('+') instead of a period.
The upper-left corner has the coordinate (0, 0).

I changed the statement and the output description.
I'm not very good at putting my ideas into words so thank you for the suggestion.
